properties.entry: SELECT DISTINCT(ROOM_NO) ,ROOM_TITLE ,ROOM_INFO ,GMEM_NO FROM ROOM JOIN VISIT USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N' AND GMEM_NO = ?
SELECT MEM_NO ,ROOM_NO ,VISIT_DT ,VISIT_CODE, MEM_NICK FROM VISIT JOIN MEMBER USING(MEM_NO)
SELECT ROOM_NO, ROOM_IMG_NAME FROM ROOM JOIN ROOM_IMG USING(ROOM_NO) WHERE DELETE_FL = 'N' AND GMEM_NO = ? AND ROOM_IMG_LEVEL = 0
